DataQualityAssertionsDatasetFacet.description: list of tests performed on dataset or dataset columns, and their results

assertion.description: Type of expectation test that dataset is subjected to

column.description: Column that expectation is testing. It should match the name provided in SchemaDatasetFacet. If column field is empty, then expectation refers to whole dataset.

severity.description: The configured severity level of the assertion. Common values are 'error' (test failure blocks pipeline) or 'warn' (test failure produces warning only).

failures.description: The actual number of rows that failed the assertion test.

properties.description: Additional tool-specific properties of the assertion.
